scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Consists of invitations to social, professional, and private events, primarily in the Washington, D.C. area., but also includes invitations to events in Kentucky. The invitations were sent by the White House, Congress, federal agencies, embassies, civic groups, special interest groups, colleges and universities, and bar associations and other organizations related to the law and politics.
Arranged chronologically by year or alphabetically by sender name.
